text: James Douglas Grant Dunn (21 October 1939 - 26 June 2020), also known as Jimmy Dunn, was a British New Testament scholar. For many years, he was the Lightfoot Professor of Divinity in the Department of Theology at the University of Durham. He worked broadly within the Protestant tradition. Dunn died on 26 June 2020, aged 80. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Durham Category:English theologians
title: James Dunn (theologian)
